title: Answer to Sri lankan president Maithripala Sirisena's butterfly (samanalaya) speech
description:
Members of the Sri Lankan LGBTQI+ community today categorically condemned President Maithripala Sirisena‚Äôs statement made at Government‚Äôs rally in Colombo saying he was promoting homophobia and public incitement of homophobic hatred.

They said in a statement that the President had made a series of homophobic comments at a public rally held on Monday and that those comments were met with laughter and applause by those gathered on stage besides Sirisena, including Mahinda Rajapaksa who was appointed as Prime Minister by Sirisena.

‚ÄúThe President, who was in a Unity Government with the United National Front (UNF) led by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, categorically stated that Mr Wickremesinghe rejected national values and had entered a ‚Äúbutterfly life‚Äù [‚Äúsamanala jeevithaya‚Äù in Sinhala], which implies a queer lifestyle.
- daily mirror
